title: The fashion editor's guide to wearing a statement suit, for every shape and size
text:
I'm freshly back from the fashion shows and can report that, both on and off the catwalk, the statement suit is here to stay. Forget any Working Girl connotations, because whether checked, patterned, neutral or one big splash of colour, the versions around now are flattering, cool and perfect for work or play.

Nipped waists, dramatic lapels, cropped flares and split-front trousers are all fashionable details. But the real challenge is in getting the fit right, and here it should be more about what works for your body than what's Of The Moment. Petite figures, for example, shouldn't be tempted by oversized masculine takes, even if these are very 'old Céline'.
